channel.title: DHCP Server on the Gateway
channel.description: DHCP would be a great feature for Whonix-Gateway. Whether it is safe, or not safe, or can be made safe is unknown. Requires original research. The open question is, does DHCP have a feature, like "please tell me the IP address of you upstream router"?
